description:
If enabled for Microsoft Edge, Application Guard opens unapproved sites in a Hyper-V virtualized browsing container.

If enabled for isolated Windows environments, Application Guard is turned on for any applications enabled for App Guard within Windows. For example, Microsoft Office, where Application Guard opens Word, Excel, PowerPoint documents safely inside a Hyper-V container.

If enabled for Microsoft Edge and isolated Windows environments, Application Guard is configured for both scenarios.

If not configured, Microsoft Defender Application Guard is not configured for Microsoft Edge or isolated Windows environments.

values.displayName: Enabled for Edge AND isolated Windows environments
